page.title: 13A FISHERMAN
page.content: Mr. Edmondson is an oyster farmer. He used to do shrimping and fishing but doesn't anymore as there are not sufficient fish or shrimps left to make it profitable. He enjoys his lifestyle. His house isabout 800 years old and is situated on the coast road. When he first lived there forty years ago the family had to get their water from a well in the garden. The house has now been modernised. He grows all his own vegetables. He drives to Barrow for shopping. He chooses to live where he does because of his work and because it is peaceful.
